content: by midknight designs op-art afghan square jennifer l christensen midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr@gmail com op-art afghan square materials  2 colors of worsted weight yarn a & b  size i/5 50mm hook or size needed for gauge  tapestry/yarn needle gauge 4 double_crochet and 2 row of double_crochet = 1 inch at gauge makes a 12 square abbreviations yo - yarn over space - space chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch st - stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet skip skip special stitches beginning extended double cluster beg- cluster chain 4 yo insert hook into back lop of 3rd chain from hook yo pull through 2 loops repeat once 3 loops on hook yo pull through all 3 loops beginning cluster made extended double cluster ex-cluster yo insert hook into stitch indicated yo pull through 1 loop on hook chain made yo pull through 2 loops on hook yo insert hook into the chain at bottom of first stitch yo pull through 2 loops on hook repeat once more 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops 3 double crochet cluster 3-double_crochet cluster yo insert hook into st or space indicated yo pull through 2 loops on hook 3 x s 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops v_stitch v-st 2 double_crochet in space indicated instructions round 1 with color a make beg-cluster see special stitches chain 3 make ex-cluster in the free chain at bottom of beg-cluster chain 3 3 x s join with slp st to top of beg-cluster finish off color a 4 ex-clusters 4 chain 3 spaces round 2 join color b in any chain 3 space chain 3 double_crochet twice chain 2 double_crochet 3 x s in same space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain 3 space repeat around join with slp st in 3rd chain of chain 3 finish off color b 24 double_crochet 4 chain 2 spaces round 3 join color a in any chain 2 space chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet twice in chain 2 space chain 1 * skip 2 double_crochet in space between the double_crochet s before the next double_crochet make 3-double_crochet cluster see special stitches chain 1 twice skip 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space ch1 repeat from * around join with slp st in 3rd chain of chain 3 finish off color a 16 double_crochet 8 3-double_crochet clusters 4 chain 2 spaces round 4 join color b in any chain 2 space chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet twice in chain 2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet skip double_crochet * make v-st see special stitches in chain 1 space skip 3-double_crochet cluster 3 x s skip double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet skip double_crochet repeat from * around join with slp st in 3rd chain of chain 3 finish off color b 24 double_crochet 12
